LOG_IN.TITLE: Log in with your Admin Credentials.
LOG_IN.SUB_TITLE: Take control of your health and well-being with Consent2Share.
LOG_IN.NO_PERMISSION_MSG: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this site.

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Inconceivable!
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: I do not think this page is where you think it is.

NOTIFICATION_MSG.NO_ENOUGH_PROVIDERS: Patient don't have enough providers to create consent. Please add providers for this patient.

PATIENT_SEARCH_CARD.TITLE: Search a Patient
PATIENT_SEARCH_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Search a patient in my organization.

PATIENT_LIST_CARD.TITLE: View Patient List
PATIENT_LIST_CARD.DESCRIPTION: View all patients in my organization.

CARD_LIST.NO_CONSENTS_MSG: There are currently no consents available. Please click the 'Add a new consent' button to create a new consent.

CARD.SHARE_ALL_MEDICAL_INFORMATION: All my medical information can be shared.

SAVED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Try This Consent Setting Against Patient Medical Record Before Sharing

SIGNED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Try This Consent Setting Against Patient Medical Record Before Sharing

REVOKED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Try This Consent Setting Against Patient Medical Record Before Sharing

DELETE_CONSENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete Consent
DELETE_CONSENT_DIALOG.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to delete this consent?

MEDICAL_INFORMATION.TITLE: Medical Information
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Select how you would like to share your medical information.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_ALL_RADIO: SHARE my medical record WITHOUT ANY EXCEPTION of medical information categories.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_SOME_RADIO: SHARE my medical record WITH EXCEPTION of specific medical information categories.

DIALOG.TITLE: Privacy Settings
DIALOG.SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: You have chosen to share all of your medical record without any exception.
DIALOG.NOT_SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: Please select the medical information that you want to share.
DIALOG.FED_DESCRIPTION: Federal requirements strictly restrict health professionals from disclosing substance abuse treatment information without signed patient consent (called 42 CFR Part 2 ). You have the right to choose the information you wish to share or not share and with whom.
DIALOG.STATE_DESCRIPTION: Most states have laws restricting health professionals from disclosing information related to substance abuse, HIV/AIDS, and mental health. ' +'Some states have restrictions regarding genetic information and communicable diseases. You have the right to choose the information you wish to share or not share and with whom.
DIALOG.WARNING_ONE: Please select the "Share my medical record without any exceptions" option,if you want to share all of your health information.
DIALOG.WARNING_TWO: Please select AT LEAST ONE category that you want to share.

PURPOSE_OF_USE.TITLE: Purpose Of Use
PURPOSE_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION: Choose for what purposes your medical information may be used.
PURPOSE_OF_USE.SHARE_TEXT: SHARE my medical record ONLY for the selected purposes of use.

DIALOG.TITLE: Share for selected purpose only
DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Share my information only for specified purposes of use.

SELECT_PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: Please select one individual or organization authorized to share your information:

TERMS.TITLE: Consent Terms
TERMS.TEXT: Enter a start and end date during which your medical records will be shared.
TERMS.ERROR_PAST_START_DATE: Start date must be today or in the future.
TERMS.ERROR_PAST_END_DATE: End date must be today or in the future.
TERMS.ERROR_END_DATE_BEFORE_START: Start date must be today or in the future, and before the end date.

CONSENT_SIGN.TITLE: Consent to Share My Medical Information

HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: HEALTH INFORMATION TO BE DISCLOSED
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_MEDICAL_INFO: To SHARE the following medical information
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_PURPOSES: To SHARE for the following purpose(s)

CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TITLE: CONSENT TERMS
CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TERMS: I, {{name}}, hereby accept, and understand the terms of this consent.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Please Authenticate
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: Please provide your account password to authenticate, and complete eSignature
CONFIRM_DIALOG.AUTHENTICATE_MSG: Failed to authenticate. Please try again.

COMPLETE_DIALOG.TITLE: Successfully Signed the Consent on behalf of the Patient
COMPLETE_DIALOG.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD_MSG: Click to download the signed consent

CONSENT_REVOKE.TITLE: Revocation of Consent to Share My Health Information

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Please Authenticate
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: Please provide your account password to authenticate, and complete eSignature
CONFIRM_DIALOG.AUTHENTICATE_MSG: Failed to authenticate. Please try again.

COMPLETE_DIALOG.TITLE: Successfully Revoked the Consent on behalf of the Patient
COMPLETE_DIALOG.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD_MSG: Click to download the signed consent revocation

CONSENT_REVOKE.TERMS: I, {{name}}, hereby accept and understand the terms of this consent.

NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_CREATING_CONSENT: Successfully created the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_CREATING_CONSENT: Error in creating the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_UPDATING_CONSENT: Successfully updated the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_UPDATING_CONSENT: Error in updating the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_SIGN_CONSENT: Successfully attested the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SIGN_CONSENT: Error in attesting the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_REVOKE_CONSENT: Successfully revoked the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_REVOKE_CONSENT: Error in revoking consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_DOWNLOAD_SAVED_CONSENT: Success in downloading the saved consent.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_SAVED_CONSENT: Failed to download the saved consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_DOWNLOAD_SIGNED_CONSENT: Success in downloading the signed consent.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_SIGNED_CONSENT: Failed to download the signed consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_REVOKED_CONSENT: Failed to download the revoked consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_DELETE_CONSENT: Successfully deleted the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DELETE_CONSENT: Failed to delete the consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_APPLY_TRY_POLICY: Failed to try this consent setting against the patient medical record. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.DUPLICATE_CONSENT: Failed to add new consent. Duplicate consent created.

LIST.TITLE: Patient List
LIST.NO_PATIENTS_MSG: There are currently no patients available. Please create a new patient.

SEARCH.TITLE: Search Patient
SEARCH.INFO: OK! You are now ready to manage your patients.
SEARCH.NO_PATIENTS_MSG: No results found. Please try again, or create a new patient.

CREATE_EDIT.INFO: Please complete all required fields to create a patient account.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm Navigation
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: You will lose all unsaved work. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

DUPLICATE_CHECK_CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm Account Creation
DUPLICATE_CHECK_CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: ATTENTION â€“ An account with similar information already exists. Please confirm the accuracy of the account information entered and select to either "Continue and Create" or go "Back to Search" screen and try again.

CONTENT.LABEL: Activate Account for:
CONTENT.RESENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: An email has been sent and awaiting the patient to activate the account. Select the 'Send Email' button to re-send an account activation email.
CONTENT.SENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: Select the 'Send Email' button to generate the Verification Code.Sending an account activation email to the address listed above will generate a unique Verification Code.

SEGMENT_DOCUMENT.WARNING: Set the options to segment this document according to the consent selected.
SEGMENT_DOCUMENT.GET_PROVIDER_NOTIFICATION_MSG: Failed to get provider by NPI...

NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SENT_EMAIL: Failed to send email. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_ENABLE_ACCOUNT: Failed to enable user account. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DISABLE_ACCOUNT: Failed to disable account. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SEARCH_PATIENT: Failed to search patient. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_CREATE_PATIENT: Failed to create patient. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_UPDATE_PATIENT: Failed to update patient. Please try again later.

CARD_LIST.WARNING: OK! You must add at least two contacts before sharing your health information.
CARD_LIST.NO_PROVIDERS_MSG: There are currently no providers available. Please click the 'Add a Health Provider' button to create a new provider.

DELETE_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

STEP_2.LABEL: PLEASE CHOOSE ONE.

PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.LABEL: Enter Provider Name and Other Criteria

RESULT.PROVIDER_ALREADY_ADDED_LABEL: This provider is already in your provider list.

VALIDATION_RULES.REQUIRED_TRUE_ERROR_MESSAGE: This field value must be true.
